attributes.action: Directly Assist Small Business with finance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All we ask is that no more money or resources are wasted underpinning banks when directly assisting small business' will help to stimulate the economy by securing jobs. Surely it would be better to unencumber a business by removing it's debt. This will allow prices to fall naturally to a level which people can afford to pay. When services and products are being bought again then the economy will flourish.
